channel.title: Spec glitch
channel.description: For the spec bar, the words always appear in yellow. Never in black. How can i fix this?

item.title: Spec glitch
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

[code]public void specialAttacks() {
if (specAmount >= 0 && specAmount <= 24) {
